text: Sutaram apani ahbana karuna [1] ebam drrha thakuna, yebhabe apani adista hayechena. Ara apani tadera kheyala-khusira anusarana karabena na ebam baluna, 'allah ye kitaba nayila karechena ami tate imana enechi ebam ami adista hayechi tomadera madhye n'yaya bicara karate. Allah amadera raba ebam tomadera'o raba. Amadera amala amadera ebam tomadera amala tomadera; amadera o tomadera madhye kono bibada-bisambada ne'i. Allah amaderake ekatra karabena ebam phire ya'oya tara'i kache
